# The `DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Common features for diagnostics dealing with optimization remarks that are used by both IR and MIR passes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Common features for diagnostics dealing with optimization remarks that are used by both IR and MIR passes.

Definition at line 486 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase() {#ae3a4821cc4da0f7c13aee43edf840e07}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase::DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase (enum <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a52b4ea3a21377555e9a0511d57945594">DiagnosticKind</a> Kind, enum <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5c">DiagnosticSeverity</a> Severity, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RemarkName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; Fn, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic.

<code>RemarkName</code> is a textual identifier for the remark (single-word, camel-case). <code>Fn</code> is the function where the diagnostic is being emitted. <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the location information to use in the diagnostic. If line table information is available, the diagnostic will include the source code location.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00529">529</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### isEnabled() {#ae68c6c41365eb4602d037a38616cf33f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual bool llvm::DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase::isEnabled () const">
Return true if this optimization remark is enabled by one of of the LLVM command line flags (-pass-remarks, -pass-remarks-missed, or -pass-remarks-analysis).

Note that this only handles the LLVM flags. We cannot access Clang flags from here (they are handled in BackendConsumer::OptimizationRemarkHandler).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00550">550</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### PassName {#a3b9b11107e5d9c73301e16d839f6c7d7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const char&#42; llvm::DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase::PassName</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Name of the pass that triggers this report.

If this matches the regular expression given in -Rpass=regexp, then the remark will be emitted.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00588">588</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

### RemarkName {#a54f8e0c579b9530254084bbb00a0e727}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringRef llvm::DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase::RemarkName"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Textual identifier for the remark (single-word, camel-case).

Can be used by external tools reading the output file for optimization remarks to identify the remark.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00593">593</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### classof() {#ad92ac2b2b2d4a1ba7b51a9070910f1db}

<MemberDefinition
